name: vaultcontract
description: Vault contract. Implementation of a safe timelock in solidity
author: Jordi Baylina

scripts.fulltest: npm install; npm run solcover; cd solcover; node ./runCoveredTests.js; eslint --fix test
scripts.solcover: git clone http://github.com/adriamb/solcover.git; cd solcover; git checkout 4e22facad7cfe2be5545cfcbdee16094678e9601; npm install
scripts.deps: npm install --save-dev truffle@3.2.1 eslint@3.19.0 babel-eslint@6 eslint-plugin-import
scripts.travis: npm run deps; npm run fulltest; ./node_modules/.bin/codecov
